event.title: "Open Source Day", Göteborg, Sweden
event.body: Adriaan de Groot and Karsten Gerloff will speak about business case studies and Free Software licenses at this event preceding FSCONS. The event takes place in Göteburg at the World Culture Museum, Södra vägen 54, Gothenburg from 12.00 to 17.30. Attendance fee is 995 SEK (you get 30% rebate at FSCONS).
